description: Ready in just 3 steps, these scrumptious wholemeal apple muffins are great to fill little tummies for a healthier breakfast or snack.
keywords: Muffins,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,May 2022,Soy free,Apple,Peanut free
name: Apple & Oat Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 small Pink lady apples, peeled, cored, diced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a 12-hole, 1/3-cup capacity muffin pan with paper cases.

Place flour and sugar in a large bowl and stir to combine. Whisk oil, eggs, milk, apple sauce and cinnamon in a large jug until combined. Add egg mixture to flour mixture and fold with a spatula until just combined. Fold in apple and 1/2 cup oats.

Divide mixture among paper cases. Sprinkle with remaining oats. Bake for 25 minutes or until muffins are golden and spring back when gently pressed. Stand muffins in pan for 10 minutes to cool slightly. Serve warm or at room temperature.
